name: Maciej Gabryelski
bio: Embedded firmware developer at 3mdeb. Linux user and fan. Interested in programmable logic devices (PLD) especially FPGAs. User of Verilog and VHDL HDL languages. Also interested in AI and machine learning (frameworks: Keras, Tensor Flow) especially using FPGA for AI performance acceleration. In my spare time I develop my own projects based on FPGAs. I am an active user of electronics and programming discussion forums.
